entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Channels can easily have unobserved exceptions #80885
  • [iOS] Matrix4x4Tests.Matrix4x4IndexerSetTest test fails #80876
  • [iOS] SpanTests.IndexOfAnyValues_GetValues test fails trying to JIT in AOT mode #80875
  • Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512DQ` lowerings in JIT. #80870
    8.0.0
  • Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512CD` lowerings in JIT. #80869
    8.0.0
  • Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512BW` lowerings in JIT. #80868
    8.0.0
  • Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512F.VL` lowerings in JIT #80867
    8.0.0
  • Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512F` lowerings in JIT. #80865
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] System.Reflection.Metadata.Tests.MetadataReaderTests.GetAssemblyName is failing #80863
  • Arm32: System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests failing with NRE #80857
  • Starting App on iOS fails with System.ExecutingEngineException #80853
  • Question about using NegotiateStream in linux and TokenImpersonationLevel #80846
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 1 Regression on 1/13/2023 8:11:05 PM #80861
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 5 Regressions on 1/13/2023 3:30:06 PM #80862
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 7 Regressions on 1/13/2023 3:30:06 PM #80871
    8.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Common no longer cross-compatible - stalling migration to .net 7 #80837
  • Perf Summary : System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Get.GetDateTimeOffset #80836
  • [API Proposal]: Regex .ctor(string, TimeSpan, CultureInfo?) #80835
  • [wasm] *all* `perf` microbenchmarks crashing with AOT+v8 #80834
    8.0.0
  • File.Copy copies through a symlink #80832
    Future
  • Add optimization for scalar/vector conversion of `uint32`/`uint64` to/from packed `float`/`double` #80829
    8.0.0

Closed

  • ARM64 - Prepare for the future #69887
    Future
  • Top Microsoft and third party NuGet packages support and work well on ARM64 #70535
    Future
  • Top used controls from the major control vendors work well on ARM64 #70536
    Future
  • .NET 7 JIT Crash when referencing struct of particular shape: Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #80624
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: The type 'System.String&' may not be used as a type argument. #80816
  • Execution of PublishSingleFile assembly crashes with "Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005" #80017
  • StreamReader.ReadLineAsync() does not return before its internal buffer is full #79238
  • Uncaught (in promise) DOMException: The user aborted a request. when Virtualize cancels the gRPC-Web call (Blazor WASM, net7 regression) #80696
    7.0.x
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 4 Regressions on 1/15/2023 10:11:50 PM #80860
  • System.Security.Principal.Windows outerloop tests fail if run as non-admin #58207
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `CollectionsMarshal.CreateList<T>(T[])` #80311
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `List<T>.Create<TState>(int, TState, SpanAction<T, TState>)` #80756
  • Workaround for providing support for EnumMemberAttribute #80838
  • JIT: `optInvertLoops` depends on bbNum ordering but doesn't guarantee it #80809
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][globalization][icu] Prepare basis for `HybridGlobalization` #79992
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: devirtualize isinst for monomorphic cases #80828
    8.0.0
  • Mono AOT compiler does not prefix exported UnmanagedCallersOnly symbols with underscore when targeting iOS #79491
    8.0.0
  • API proposal: Mask testing for IPAddress #42845
    Future
  • [Android] System.Diagnostics.Process LongProcessNamesAreSupported Fails #53095

PullRequests

Created

  • Shave ~90K off regex in native aot #80884
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update spmi asp.net script #80882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Manual .NET 7 backport of #80218 fixing #79327 #80881
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Fixes for NonBacktracking with some combinations of loops and anchors #80880
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Make GetAssemblyName test more robust. #80878
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [iOS][Android] ActiveIssue SpanTests, Matrix4x4Tests, and MetaDataReaderTests that are failing on CI #80877
  • Don't try to build FunctionalTests test assets as tests #80874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix nested non-byref like VC with no pointer fields #80873
    Servicing-consider, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Manual .NET 6 backport of #80218 fixing #79327 #80872
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
  • Fix single method compilation for shared generics #80864
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: build pred lists before the eh opt phases #80856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80855
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Allow forwarding field accesses off of implicit byrefs #80852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Generalize last-use copy elision for implicit byrefs #80851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][browser] improve default initial memory size #80849
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Enable CA1859 - Use concrete types when possible for improved performance #80848
  • [mono][wasm] Fix an llvm assert. #80844
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, needs-author-action
  • Avoid TypeSpec resolution when checking for IsValueType #80842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Introduce insGroup/instrDesc backwards navigation #80840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace bit shifting with Avx2.Permute4x64 #80830
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Make the type components cache factory even more lazy #80843
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update SqlClient mentionee #80883
    area-System.Data.SqlClient
  • Change Andy as the owner of interop area labels #80879
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • fix TLS resume with client certificates #79898
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer #80548
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Suppress warnings for taking address of TypedReference #80484
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Fix indexing of correlated diagnostic binaries #80652
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix nested non-byref like VC with no pointer fields #80642
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [iOS] Change test exclusion path for System.Reflection.Emit tests #80800
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add note about wa-info tools #80859
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][aot] Fix a problem with #80682. #80839
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #80693
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: update bbNums before inverting loops #80827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT fixes around data flow analysis #80694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws #80792
    area-System.Net
  • LambdaExpression.CanCompileToIL should respect IsDynamicCodeSupported #80759
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Fix dynamic class zeroing #80822
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: devirtualize isinst/castclass for monomorphic cases #80831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prefix exported symbols via UnmanagedCallersOnly attribute #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][interp] Properly initialize fields of LocalValue #80795
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove `CustomAttributeData` usage in IsByRefLike #80841
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove uses of `TypeInfo` from the reflection stack #80833
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove the TypeKey concept as the primary user for the concept is unable to use it effectively. #79418
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Make TypeComponentsCache trimmable #80726
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows #80886
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add System.Text.CompositeFormat #80753
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    area-Build-mono
  • Ensure various scalar cross platform helper APIs are handled directly as intrinsic #80789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Remove the second type parameter from CastingConverter #80755
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use newer ubuntu 20.04 images #80808
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] improve default initial memory size #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Support Unicode 15 #80804
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Final removal of uses of Windows wide char printing #80758
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] perf - debugging #80796
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Raw ECDiffieHellman key agreement #80819
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix mess with precode macro definitions #80806
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources #80785
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fold `static readonly VectorX` to GT_CNS_VEC #80670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Ensure call offset is greater than offset of other active calls #80728
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [draft][browser] enable closure compiler for dotnet.js #80178
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix HttpStress & SslStress #80713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map #80501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix TargetOS value `linux` instead of `Unix` #80794
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Declare CoreClrPgoDataArg variable in CI script #80324
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Don't check time budget in inliner when --Ot is set #80817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • allow to set custom serial speed on Linux #80534
    os-linux, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: outstanding tasks #2169
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Ilc is crashing on some input #2174
  • Support x86 for NativeAOT #1471

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable shared generics #2176

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge up to but not including PR67238 #2175

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • vstest command no longer allows multiple loggers #30034
  • Resolve issues with testing 8.0 templates in SDK repo #30033
  • Dotnet Build fails, trying to copy "files" referencing old dotnet user-secrets #30020
  • [ARM64]After installing the .NET 8.0 SDK and running "dotnet workload install wasm-tools-net6" using the command line will meet: "workload ID wasm-tools-net6 is not supported on this platform". #30019

Closed

  • Cannot restore NuGet packages with dotnet restore command #30027
  • NETSDK1109 \ #29600
    Discussion
  • Unable to build macos binaries on linux #29955
  • Disable inclusion of IIS hosting assets (ANCM & web.config) in publish output when PublishNativeAot=true #29896

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30031
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for destructor and explicit interface implementation generation. #30030
    Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • Add support for EnableRequestDelegateGenerator flag #29982
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2092396 #30009
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use better AOT defaults in Web SDK #29984
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Mention that preview SDKs in VS needs to be turned on in the dev guide #29870
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30006
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30013
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure Blazor startup succeeds #29899
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29990
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use UTF-8 Encoding by Default On Windows On Non English Languages #29755
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • Require await to apply nullable postconditions to task-returning calls #6888

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source Generators: Post-build event #66491
  • INvalidOperationException from VisualBasicMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider #66489
  • Unexpected "field is never used" warning #66487
  • Unnecessary (?) CS8907 when base record got property and derived record got same property as constructor parameter #66494
  • Suppressing warning CA1854 creates invalid entry in suppression file #66486
    Backlog
  • IDE0055 for indented comment #66478

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33319.227 #66493
  • Assertion in nullable walker: "Did not find BoundBinaryOperator in the map." #65050
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66490
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Clean up some checks in FileChangeWatcher.Context.EnqueueWatchingFile #66488
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66482
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Option helpers for VS Mac #66479
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2091149 #66287
  • Allow missing CommandLineArgsForDesignTimeEvaluation msbuild property #66367
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix doc comment on ForAttributeWithMetadataName #66452
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Avoid capturing allocation in GetOrCreateDescriptor #66466
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Reduce NamingStylePreferences allocations for Default and Empty #66467
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Create closed Razor file integration test #66459
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Visit unreachable `when` clauses by `NullableWalker` #66405
    Next
  • Revert "Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2087177" #66476
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2088372" #66477
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next

Updated

  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Different behaviour of discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.6
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers
  • Preserve changes that are still relevant after revert of #66311 #66440
    Area-Compilers
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Adding keyword recommendations after FileKeyword #66357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Instrumentation state #66429
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers
  • Treat `TypedReference` as managed #66328
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE
  • Take incremental nullability snapshot for local functions #66406
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references #66430
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Add support for generating ref-members in SyntaxGenerator #66445
    Area-IDE
  • Visit query lambda by `NullableWalker` even without conversion #66384
    Area-Compilers
  • Gracefully handle negative endLine and endColumn values for build errors #66458
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Report example of unanalyzed node in `NullableWalker` #66385
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure no extension method applies to System.Void #66416
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix mismatched per-language option storages #66421
    Area-IDE
  • Validate that all options are successfully read from VS settings. #66447
    Area-IDE
  • Fix stepping UI delays #66450
    Area-Interactive

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgraded to net6.0 recently and noticing references of packages like Microsoft.VisualBasic in the using statements #46175
  • Improve UpdatingMajorVersionAndTFM.md #46173
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Get an error NETSDK1082 "There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'." when referencing a Razor Class Library from Blazor Web Assembly App: #46171
  • Add API to System.Web adapters to enable explicitly mapping Blazor pages #46170
  • Unobserved task exception in SignalR C# client when streaming #46169
  • SignalR android SDK Release note #46168
  • aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js:234 WebSocket connection error when running Blazor WASM project #46167
  • w3wp.exe APPCRASH - The process was terminated due to an unhandled exception: System.InvalidOperationException: The current thread is not associated with the Dispatcher. #46165
  • Add `Map` implementation with overload for `InferMetadata` and `CreateRequestDelegate` #46163
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Test Collection Cleanup Failure (Controller Test Collection)]: System.InvalidOperationException : The logger is already frozen. #46162

Closed

  • Define Content-Length for Range Normalization in FileStreamResultExecutor.cs #45734
  • UserName and Email in Identity core #45938
  • Blazor webassembly not reloading #46159
  • Not able to asign a role to a newly created user (ASP.NET Identity) #45941
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting RateLimiterPolicy GetPartitionAsync #45603
  • ASP.Net Razor Pages -> Cross Page Posting #45733
  • [Blazor Server] Sould I catch OperationCanceledException in OnParametersSetAsync/LifeCycle methods when cancelling Tasks inside it? #45282
  • Remove the Blazor survey link from the project templates #45854
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM loading of appsettings.json config doesn't use provided `loadBootResource` function #43700
    .NET 8 Planning
  • AddRazorRuntimeCompilation is hardcoded to use SHA1 for checksum comparison and PrecompiledView are provided with SHA256 checksum. #45577
    8.0-preview1
  • Customizable serverTimeoutInMilliseconds in Server-Side Blazor #18840
    8.0-preview1
  • AntiforgeryValidationException #46124
    Discussions
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web should default to TrimMode=full #46084
    8.0-preview2
  • gRPC requests fail if made via nginx k8s ingress controller #46079
  • InputFile OnChange doesn't trigger when I click on a label #45901
  • NavigationLock not working #45316
  • [signalr-client-c++] Client send access_token in Qtcreator #45363
  • In Dot Net 6 Getting this error in log file - The response headers cannot be modified because the response has already started. #45889

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent merging PRs which have CI checks run a week+ ago #46177
    area-infrastructure
  • Wait for Request to finish #46176
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Added withServerTimeout and withKeepAliveInterval to HubConnectionBuilder for java client #46172
    area-signalr
  • [Named pipes] Disconnect + delayed client read test cases #46166
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Use a fresh execution context for application logic #46164
    breaking-change, area-signalr

Merged

  • [Mvc] Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull in ChecksumValidator #46174
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • Add section to UpdatingMajorVersionAndTFM.md about marking APIs shipped #46088
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add token to Dependabot config #46160
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [Blazor wasm] Use provided loadBootResource function to override how config is loaded #43969
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • ChecksumValidator: support SHA256 #45612
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Enable setting ServerTimeout and KeepAliveInterval in HubConnectionBuilder #46065
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview1
  • Removed SurveyPrompt from blazor server and blazor wasm project templates #46150
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix Blazor PageContext disposal #46097
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Move Kestrel shared source to src\Shared #46112
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks
  • Making `JsonOptions` AOT/Trimmer-safe with EnsureJsonTrimmability switch #45886
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/WebAssembly.Authentication/src/Interop #45978
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/Authentication.Msal/src/Interop #45977
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/common #45966
    area-signalr, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/CustomElements/src/js #45953
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/Web.JS #45864
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Additional Contacts properties #12797
  • Ground Overlays in NET MAUI Maps #12795
  • Android - Soft Keyboard - AdjustPan - Page does not un-pan when keyboard is closed #12793
  • Bound property does not update UI #12790
  • MAUI app build on long path not working #12777
  • MAUI cannot get the length of the stream from FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync on Android #12776
  • Rollback JSON file links are not accessible #12772
  • Hiding Entry underline inside compile directive does not work #12771
  • Fail to Install App on iOS Simulator 'Could not load the framework DVItunesSoftwareServiceFoundation' #12770
  • [Blazor] Optimize IPC channel for Blazor Desktop #12767
  • OnRequest permission invoke on mainactivity shows warning as it supports only v23.0 and later #12764
  • Problem encountered on MAUI first app tutorial device Emulator setup. #12763
  • "dotnet build" complains about missing nuget packages #12762
  • Error when Printing through JS when using .NET Maui Blazor Hybrid #12761
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ScrollBarVisibility "Always" is not consistent. #12760

Closed

  • TodoREST Sample Project “HttpRequestException: The Internet connection appears to be offline.” “Local network prohibited” on iOS 16 #12731
  • Error en Shell Flyout #12587
    Backlog
  • build fails if xaml is in Platform/Windows folder #12306
  • Calling async method inside CreateMauiApp #12524
  • EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGKILL (Code Signature Invalid)) - App crashes when starting #12483
  • Unable to Build and Debug Android #12549
  • New Maui projects should only open the Overview Page in VS #12755
  • Measure not working correctly on Layouts with fixed size constraints #7531
    7.0-rc2
  • MAUI apps crash on launch on Windows after Visual Studio update - code 2147942405 (0x80070005) #12080
  • Difficult installation #12664
  • .NET MAUI GIVING ERRORS AFTER UPDATING FROM VS 2022 17.4.3 TO 17.4.4 #12681
  • App shell does not fill screen on iOS when no splash screen is added to project. #11951
  • Setting SetIsSmoothScrollEnabled to false on a TabbedPage causes blank pages after navigating. #7558
  • Entry ClearButton does not clear the text? #9954
    Backlog
  • Winforms process not stopping correctly when using WebView2 #7997
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8 #12803
  • [net7.0] Add more logging for BlazorWebView (#12357) #12801
  • [net7.0] Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #12800
  • [net7.0] Process ContainerView through mapper and fix NeedsContainer logic #12799
  • [net7.0] Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #12798
  • Fix password placeholder font issue on Android #12792
    area/controls 🎮
  • Revert "Fix timing on iOS Toolbar (#12363)" #12788
  • [Windows] Fix crash disconnecting CollectionView #12774
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix issues invalidating the Background of some controls #12773
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 #12768
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Make MediaPicker capture methods work in Android 13+ #12766
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Merged

  • [net7.0] Modify generics on replaced mappers inside `Controls` to cover more types. #12785
  • Prevent mobile and lib templates from opening editors if in VS #12756
    community ✨
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Fix Slider crash using the same Minimum, Maximum value #12784
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Actions] Use the default github token. #12794
    community ✨
  • [net7.0] Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (alternative) #12782
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials PhoneDialer API Docs #12781
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials VersionTracking API Docs #12787
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Compass API Docs #12780
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Vibration API Docs #12783
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Fix MenuFlyoutSubItemHandler to actually call MapIsEnabled #12789
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Map API Docs #12779
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Fixed a typo on the Display Info Width documentation #12778
  • Fix BlazorWebView WinForms deadlock when disposing #12656
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Removed SurveyPrompt from maui blazor template #12769
  • Stable branding for 7.0.1xx-sr3 #12775
  • Ensure iOS always has the required splash storyboard #12677
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12757
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Share API Docs #12722
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update SemanticScreenReader API Docs #12724
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Update to 6.0 SR10 version #12752
  • One more version ahead #12758
  • Dev/ios guid splash #12759
  • Use relative X position of tap when determining if the button was hit #12753

Updated

  • Simplification of interface declaration in code #12728
    community ✨
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #10812
    area/single project ☝️
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Remove obsoleted OpenGLView #12579
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Retain the cursor position when transforming the text #12750
    area/controls 🎮
  • Ensure flyout detail updated on Android Tablet side-by-side layout on navigation push of 2nd page #12754
    community ✨
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • added monochrome element to the AdaptiveIconDrawableXml #12564
    community ✨
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • [Windows] Align Graphics APIs naming with the rest of the platforms #12578
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix initial page and back button Navigation events #12348
    area/navigation 🧭
  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
    area/lifecycle 🔁

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core 6 session get returns null #30099
  • EF Core ChangeTracker entities snapshot and reset to that snapshot #30097
  • IDbContextFactory<TContext> is not covariant #30096
  • Map part of the entity to Json column without the need of Owned entity container. #30094

Closed

  • EFCore 7.0.2 Bug - Invalid Operation Exception RE "Temporary Value" #30059
  • Insert fails when model has tables with same name in different schemas #30087
  • EF.CompileAsyncQuery with CancellationToken doesn't actually cancel query execution (SQL Server). #29968
  • Why when I rename a table it drops and creates a new table? #30078
  • PostgreSQL Array Type Mapping and SQLite in EF Core 7 #30095
  • Document Scaffold-DBContext behavior for table and views from when -Schema specified #19986
    8.0.0
  • Provide more information when 'No DbContext was found' error is generated #18715
    8.0.0
  • RegexMatchTimeoutException for SqlServerMigrationsSqlGenerator #16175
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Move taking of lock earlier to avoid race in PruneCallback #30098
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.4

Merged

  • Clarify how the --table and --schema parameters work when scaffolding #30071
  • Provide more information when exception thrown discovering/creating design-time DbContexts #30070
  • Remove regex from SqlServerMigrationsSqlGenerator #30069

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable Synchronize_VMR in PR validation #15312
  • Remove Mono.Cecil dependency from poison infra #15311

Merged

  • Suppress noisy RAR messages to see if that cleans up the logs some #15253
  • Tag the official VMR build with installer SHA #15308
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Enable SHA1 signing for CentOS Stream 9 #15289
  • Fix permissions on the Codespaces init script #15306
  • Scan the VMR for binaries and cloaked files #15299
  • Add Codespaces for source build investigations #15285

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #15279
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add CI for building with N-1 source-built SDK #15164
    Area-SourceBuild
